name: Small Business Bookkeeping
description: Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g., {{InvoiceNumber}}, {{ClientName}}). Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching head
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Balance Sheet; Profit and Loss; Cash Flow Statement; Customizable categories:It's easy to customize the categories of each section to suit your needs and requirements.; Historical tracking:This helps you keep track of historical transactions and client-related activities for easy reference.; Real-Time tracking:Provides real-time updated accounts and helps simplify the bookkeeping process for any user.
